Dear ImGui v1.90.1
Source: https://github.com/ocornut/imgui
Downloaded: January 2024
License: MIT (see LICENSE.txt)

Files included:
- Core ImGui library (imgui.cpp, imgui_draw.cpp, imgui_tables.cpp, imgui_widgets.cpp)
- Headers (imgui.h, imgui_internal.h, imconfig.h)
- STB dependencies (imstb_rectpack.h, imstb_textedit.h, imstb_truetype.h)
- GLFW backend (imgui_impl_glfw.cpp, imgui_impl_glfw.h)
- OpenGL3 backend (imgui_impl_opengl3.cpp, imgui_impl_opengl3.h, imgui_impl_opengl3_loader.h)
- WebGPU backend (imgui_impl_wgpu.cpp, imgui_impl_wgpu.h - for future use)

Total: 18 files (minimal set from 100+ file repository)

Upgrade instructions:
1. Download new Dear ImGui version from https://github.com/ocornut/imgui
2. Copy the same 18 files listed above to vendor/imgui/
3. Update this VERSION.txt file with new version number
4. Test build and runtime
